hero.headline: Artsy Professional Buyer Program
hero.subheadline: Vetted fine art and design for your clients at any budget

proposition.headline: Buy Art and Design in One Place

benefits.headline: Professional Buyer Status
benefits.description: Your inquires on works will be expedited, allowing faster access to 4,000+ dealers and galleries around the world.

benefits.headline: Expert Service from Artsy
benefits.description: Our specialists are available to help you buy works that fit your requirements and offer complimentary advising.

benefits.headline: Advanced Access to Fairs & Auctions
benefits.description: Get first access to art fair and auction previews before they can be accessed publicly.

benefits.headline: Personal invitations to Artsy Events
benefits.description: We will extend you invitations to private Artsy events at galleries, artist studios and fairs, and VIP previews.

testimonials.quote: While I have many gallery directors on speed dial, I still buy a great number of works through Artsy. The site helped me connect with tens of new galleries around the world and build collections for three clients, all online
testimonials.author: Monica, Miami
